sentences.en: "I don't have your imagination," King said unhappily.
sentences.cn: “我不像你那么有想象力。”金不高兴地说道。

sentences.en: A child may not differentiate between his imagination and the real world.
sentences.cn: 儿童可能无法将自己的幻想与真实世界区分开来。

sentences.en: A conservatory offers the perfect excuse to let your imagination run riot.
sentences.cn: 音乐学院让你有充分的理由任想象力自由驰骋。

sentences.en: a storyteller with an incredible imagination
sentences.cn: 想象力极丰富的讲故事者

sentences.en: Alistair had a logical mind, and little imagination.
sentences.cn: 阿利斯泰尔逻辑思维能力很强，但缺乏想象力。

sentences.en: Did you hear that noise, or was it my imagination?
sentences.cn: 你听到那个声音了吗？ 还是那是我的幻觉？

sentences.en: For once, the artist'sfertile imagination failed him.
sentences.cn: 这位画家丰富的想象力曾一度枯竭。

sentences.en: He submerges himself in the world of his imagination.
sentences.cn: 他沉浸在自己想象的世界中。

sentences.en: Her husband was not a womaniser by any stretch of the imagination.
sentences.cn: 她老公绝对不是个拈花惹草的人。

sentences.en: His music lacked that vital spark of imagination.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐缺少非常关键的那一点灵感。

sentences.en: It does not take much imagination to understand their grief.
sentences.cn: 不难想象他们是多么悲伤。

sentences.en: Italian football captured the imagination of the nation last season.
sentences.cn: 上个赛季意大利足球吸引了全国上下的注意。

sentences.en: The work demanded boundless energy and theatrical imagination.
sentences.cn: 这种工作需要具备无限的精力和夸张的想象力。

sentences.en: Their films are exciting and really stretch the imagination.
sentences.cn: 他们的电影非常精彩且发人深省。

sentences.en: There is, too, a simple failure of imagination.
sentences.cn: 还有，就是纯粹缺乏想象力。

sentences.en: These people do exist; they’re not figments of my imagination.
sentences.cn: 这些人确实存在，他们不是我凭空想象出来的。

sentences.en: These poems have helped kindle the imagination of generations of children.
sentences.cn: 这些诗激发了一代又一代孩子的想象力。

sentences.en: Unfettered by the bounds of reality, my imagination flourished.
sentences.cn: 跳出现实的束缚，我的想象力天马行空。

sentences.en: With a little imagination, you can find great inexpensive gifts.
sentences.cn: 稍微动点脑筋，你就会找到物美价廉的礼物。

sentences.en: You're letting your imagination run away with you.
sentences.cn: 你这是在想入非非。

words.tran_cn: 虚构的；富于想像的；有创造力的

phrases.tran_cn: 只是幻觉；只是我的幻想

trans.tran_en: the ability to form pictures or ideas in your mind
